ygData.subject: Re: Hunting Blacknightmare
ygData.msgSnippet: Four figures approached out of the skies, landing lightly on the ground. Alright! said Deepstryke, the tallest of them and their commander. grid search plan

Four figures approached out of the skies, landing lightly on the
ground. 

"Alright!" said Deepstryke, the tallest of them and their commander.
"grid search plan beta. There must be something here. Find it!"

The other figures spread out and began a methodical search of the
terrain, booted feet trampling down the vegetation as they searched. 

"I'm only picking up residual energy readings." Phobia said, the red
and black armored female in almost disgusted tones. "There's nothing
here."

"Don't be too quick." Tumult chimed in from his search. "I found a bit
of discarded armor here." He picked up a small bit of metal. "It looks
like it is Unicronian. Must be Blacknightmare's" He frowned.

"This is all a pile of RUST!" Decibel grumbles from her position. "We
should be cracking some aftplates, not rumbling around in the bush of
this ball of dirt."

Deepstryke glanced over at Decibel, but as she was still working, saw
no need to chastise her at the moment. There would be time enough for
her abilities to be put to the test. 

"What about this?" Phobia picked up a piece of armor from the ground.
"It looks Predacon ... " She flipped it over in her hands expertly. "
.. a piece of a shoulder module." 

Deepstryke nodded as he looked around, "Yes, there was something more."
He looked over at the area, "Search there and there." He directed his
subordinates.

Tumult fanned out in search. "I can see where they crouched in
preparation for combat, but no shells casing or scorch marks from
firing. "They must have held fire for some reason."

Deepstryke stepped over to examine the unmistakable imprint of a
shuttle. "Predacon armor, a standoff? Must have been Maximals and
Predacons." he continued to look around. He pointed, "Someone was
standing here .. the focal point of at least part of this scenario, and
he walked from that way." He pointed back to where the rest were
standing.  

Phobia nodded as she searched, "I can see where one of them was
crouched to attack the one at the focal point. She grunted in derision,
"Probably a Predacon."

Nightrazor appeared from seemingly nowhere. His face was firm and
resolved as he squatted to look at the prints.  "There was another,
somewhat lighter." he followed the steps around, scanning the
underbrush. "Everything is a little old now, but from the looks of
things these two stood off the others and 'rescued' Blacknightmare."
Nightrazor paused and examined the ground carefully, "The first one
stood off a group of others while a second one lifted Blacknightmare
off the ground." Nightrazor looked around, �This feels like Maximals,
Predacons are not for standing off an obviously superior foe, they
would rather run.

�Nor endangering their lives for another.� Phobia chimed in.

Deepstryke nodded, �It would have to be a bot of power or charisma to
stand-off Predacons.�

�Rodimus Prime?� Decibel bellowed

�I can�t tell.� Nightrazor�s voice was thoughtful as he looked around.
He was probably the most skilled of the team to read these marks and
yet he couldn�t get a complete picture. �I haven�t seen any missile
strikes and just from prints I can only get general weight and
movements.� He frowned.

Tumult grunted, �Only a few shell casing. They didn�t fire all that
much, but when they did they were using predominantly energy weapons.
But I have to agree. I would bet my last credit that this was a Maximal
standoff, and they won.�

Deepstryke nodded, �To the air then Minions We have what we can get
here! We have a new target! The Maximals!�

The rest of the figures leaped into the air, shifted form and along
with deepstryke disappeared into the skies!

Preston
(Da'minion)
